Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A billionaires death causes a bloody turn when an AI android built for human companionship goes haywire. Sci-fi horror, starring Jack Quaid, Sophie Thatcher Lukas Gage and Megan Suri

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: Two buddies sneak into a party on New Years Eve 1999, but the night turns even crazier as the clock hits midnight. Director Kyle Mooneys teen horror comedy, starring Jaeden Martell, Rachel Zegler and Julian Dennison

programme.title: A Newport Christmas
programme.desc: A charitable and spirited Newport socialite in 1905 dreams of using her cash to start a foundation to help others in town. Romantic drama, starring Wes Brown and Ginna Claire Mason

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: Two buddies sneak into a party on New Years Eve 1999, but the night turns even crazier as the clock hits midnight. Director Kyle Mooneys teen horror comedy, starring Jaeden Martell, Rachel Zegler and Julian Dennison

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: A science teachers life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town. Sci-fi comedy drama, starring Brandon Routh, Mena Suvari and Malina Pauli Weissman

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A chain of bizarre and deadly incidents in several countries leads scientists to the conclusion that the Earths core has stopped spinning. As chaos erupts around the world, experts hatch a plan to halt the destruction and save the human race - but it involves venturing deep below the planets surface to detonate a nuclear bomb. Sci-fi thriller, starring Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Stanley Tucci and DJ Qualls

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family become convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs. Steven Soderberghs horror thriller, starring Lucy Liu, Chris Sullivan, Callina Liang and Eddy Maday

programme.title: The Accursed
programme.desc: A woman named Elly is asked by family friend Alma to look after an elderly lady living in a remote cabin for a few days. She agrees, but soon discovers there is a demon hiding in the woman, waiting to break free. Horror, starring Mena Suvari, Sarah Grey and Meg Foster

programme.title: Lovely, Dark and Deep
programme.desc: A ranger travels alone through the dangerous wilderness, hoping to uncover the origins of a tragedy that has haunted her since she was a child. Writer/director Teresa Sutherlands horror, starring Georgina Campbell and Nick Blood

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A New England seaside towns tourist season is turned into a nightmare by a giant killer shark. The local police chiefs efforts to protect the public are thwarted by the greedy mayor, forcing him to join forces with a grizzled fisherman and an enthusiastic marine biologist to hunt and kill the monster predator. Steven Spielbergs thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Richard Dreyfuss and Robert Shaw

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely woman allows a group of teenagers to throw a party in her basement, provided they follow some simple rules - one of which is to always call her Ma. Over the course of the night, their kindly host shows a far more sinster side to her nature - and her young guests find themselves trapped in a nightmare. Horror, starring Octavia Spencer and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: A palaeontologist, a game warden, a conspiracy theorist and a redneck sheriff each set out to investigate a mysterious death on the shore of a lake, only to find themselves up against a man-eating 30ft crocodile with an insatiable appetite. Comedy horror, starring Bill Pullman, Bridget Fonda, Oliver Platt, Brendan Gleeson and Betty White

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: Two parents do whatever it takes to keep their children safe in a world full of creatures hunting every sound they hear. Nothing can be heard from the family hiding in silence, but all it takes is one noise and everything can go horrifically wrong. Horror, starring real-life husband-and-wife duo Emily Blunt and John Krasinski, who also directed

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: The Ring 2
programme.desc: Journalist Rachel Keller and her son try to rebuild their shattered lives, moving from Seattle to Oregon and starting afresh. However, the vengeful spirit of Samara follows, and this time she is determined to destroy them. Sequel to the horror remake, starring Naomi Watts, Simon Baker and David Dorfman, and featuring a cameo appearance from Sissy Spacek

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: Due to the pandemic, Parker and her best friend decide to quarantine at the family lake house alone - or so they think. Horror, starring Gideon Adlon, Bethlehem Million and Dylan Spradberry

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: A father and his two sons face off against terrifying creatures in a remote farmhouse. Director Benjamin Brewers dystopian horror thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Jaeden Martell and Maxwell Jenkins

programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: A 19th-century widow must make an unimaginable choice when, during a cruel winter, a foreign ship sinks off the coast of her fishing village. Horror mystery, starring Odessa Young, Joe Cole, Siobhan Finneran and Rory McCann

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: The seaside resort of Amity is terrorised once again by a man-eating great white shark. While police chief Brody struggles to alert the townsfolk to the magnitude of the danger, a group of teenagers - including Brodys two sons - is adrift at sea in waters hunted by the shark. Thriller sequel, starring Roy Scheider, Lorraine Gary and Murray Hamilton

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: Two parents do whatever it takes to keep their children safe in a world full of creatures hunting every sound they hear. Nothing can be heard from the family hiding in silence, but all it takes is one noise and everything can go horrifically wrong. Horror, starring real-life husband-and-wife duo Emily Blunt and John Krasinski, who also directed

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After African American photographer Chris and his white girlfriend Rose visit her wealthy parents, he suspects theres more to the locals than meets the eye. Oscar-winning psychological thriller written and directed by Jordan Peele (Us), starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of their small New England town. Part one of a two-part Horror based on the Stephen King novel, starring Bill Skarsgard, Jaeden Lieberher and Sophia Lillis

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his mother, he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielbergs sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances OConnor

programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In central Europe during 2041, a female detective investigates the case of a slain couple where a restoration team is able to bring one of them back to life. Sci-fi thriller, starring Andrea Mohylova, Matej Hádek and Milan Ondrík

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Estranged childhood friends Heather and Carla reunite for a cup of tea after not having spoken in many years. At their meeting, Heather presents an unexpected proposition that will change their lives forever. Director Guillem Morales thriller, starring Naomie Harris and Natalie Dormer

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: The disappearance of an eight-year-old girl ties together a series of past deaths and disappearances, as well as bringing the truth about a broken familys history into the light. Thriller written and directed by Logan George and Celine Held, starring Dylan OBrien and Eliza Scanlen

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer is all set to leave the criminal world behind and start a new life abroad. However, his plans are thwarted when he is asked to track down a gangsters drug-addicted daughter and locate a stolen shipment of Ecstasy. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Michael Gambon, Colm Meaney, Kenneth Cranham and Sienna Miller

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patients fractured mind as a 24th character with apparent superhuman abilities attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalans thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: The FBI agent who first captured Hannibal Lecter is called out of retirement to catch a demented murderer dubbed the Tooth Fairy, who slaughters a family whenever there is a full moon - forcing the detective to draw on the imprisoned cannibals expertise in criminal psychology. Thriller prequel adapted from the first of Thomas Harriss Lecter novels, starring Anthony Hopkins, Edward Norton, Ralph Fiennes and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: A cynical petty crook is inspired when he sees a freelance camera crew, and decides to go into business filming crime scenes and accidents, then selling the footage to news broadcasters. His determination to stay ahead of the competition leads him down a dark path as his methods become increasingly ruthless. Crime drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rene Russo and Bill Paxton

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: A series of interlinked stories about the Los Angeles underworld. A hitman plays minder to his bosss wife, and he and his partner deal with a dead body following a mishap with a gun. Meanwhile, a washed-up boxer goes on the run after refusing to throw a fight, and two lovers plot a hold-up in a diner. Quentin Tarantinos crime drama, starring John Travolta, Samuel L Jackson, Uma Thurman, Bruce Willis, Ving Rhames, Tim Roth and Amanda Plummer

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his familys Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Francis Ford Coppolas crime drama sequel, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach and Bridget Fonda

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Nov 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective Dirty Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors disapproval. Don Siegels thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson

programme.title: Jack Reacher

Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia, Don Cheadle and Elliott Gould

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Bennys spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husbands tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and Austin Butler

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: An assassination attempt is made on the life of the US president during a terrorism summit. The story unfolds from several perspectives, including that of the secret service agents charged with protecting the head of state, a news producer covering the event and a man in the crowd who may have caught the perpetrator on camera. Thriller, starring Dennis Quaid, Matthew Fox, Forest Whitaker, Sigourney Weaver and William Hurt

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: On holiday in Europe, American couple Ben and Louise Dalton and their anxiety-crippled daughter Agnes meet English doctor Patrick Feld, his wife Ciara and their young son Ant, who was born without a tongue. The Daltons vacation soon turns into a nightmare when they are invited to stay on the Felds country estate. Horror, starring James McAvoy, Mackenzie Davis, Scoot McNairy and Aisling Franciosi

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective Dirty Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors disapproval. Don Siegels thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Fugitive serial killer Dr Hannibal Lecter has gone into hiding as an academic in Italy, but a disfigured victim is determined to find him and inflict a gruesome revenge. FBI agent Clarice Starling is once again drawn into the doctors deadly orbit as she finds herself being used as bait for the avengers trap. Ridley Scotts thriller sequel, starring Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta

programme.desc: A chance for viewers to purchase goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Will takes Karen to see one of the best doctors in the city after she misses her check-up, while Jack flirts with a male nurse - and the idea of becoming one himself. Guest starring Jack Black

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Karen lets Jack skip nursing school, and Grace returns to New York to celebrate her mothers birthday - to the delight of Will, who tries to persuade her to stay longer

programme.title: The Conners
programme.sub-title: Yard Sale, Phone Fail, and a College Betrayal
programme.desc: As Louise moves into the Conners home, Dan finds himself confronted with old memories

programme.title: The Conners
programme.sub-title: Three Exes, Role Playing and a Waterbed
programme.desc: Darlene brings Nick to the hardware store, where they run into Ben. Dan tries to spruce up the bedroom while Louise is out on the road

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie announces to the girls that she and Aidan have exchanged apartment keys. Miranda has to stay strong when her mother dies, and Samantha learns some new positions from her latest lover - a wrestling coach. Comedy series, starring Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Cynthia Nixon and Kristin Davis

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Miranda discovers Steve has testicular cancer and Carrie tells the girls she has been invited to Aidans country cabin - so Samantha reluctantly volunteers to accompany her. Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Cynthia Nixon and Kristin Davis star

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: Hannah has a potential writing assignment in the pipeline and - in the name of research - she buys some cocaine and heads out for a night on the town with Elijah, who reveals a big secret. Meanwhile, Marnie bumps into artist Booth Jonathan and quickly falls back under his spell

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: Jessa makes a bad impression on Thomas-Johns parents, while Shoshanna has doubts about her relationship with Ray. Hannah forces Elijah to move out and wastes no time in throwing a celebratory dinner party. However, when Marnie makes a surprise appearance, Charlie is caught between girlfriends past and present and the evening quickly goes off the rails

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: A medical check-up reveals Grace has possible signs of breast cancer, and she learns her emergency contact is not Will but her ex-husband Leo. Meanwhile, after losing out on a dog food commercial, Jack takes a temp job as drama teacher in the Bronx and despite her best efforts Karen befriends a 12-year-old girl. Eric McCormack and Debra Messing star

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: A young boy called Skip knocks on Jacks door, claiming to be his grandson. Jack has become estranged from artificially conceived son Elliot, who is now paying a visit to New York along with his family. The unexpected joy of being reunited quickly fades when Skip reveals he is also gay and that his parents plan to send him to a therapy camp in the hope of fixing him. Horrified, Jack and Will resolve to do whatever they must to save Skip - even if it means Will making out with the camp counsellor. Eric McCormack and Sean Hayes star

programme.title: The Conners

programme.title: King of Lies: Footballs Greatest Con

programme.title: Celtics City
programme.desc: Documentary charting the history of the Boston Celtics basketball team from their formation in 1946 to a record 18th NBA championship in the 2023-24 season. programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner

programme.title: Ultimate Mysteries

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: How Churchill resisted advice to make peace with Hitler and ordered the Navy to proceed with the evacuation of Allies in northern France in 1940. programme.title: Memories of D-Day

programme.title: Ancient Aliens

He stated he had been in contact with these extraterrestrials telepathically since the age of five and that they allowed him to take photographs and videos of their spacecraft

programme.title: Invasion: The Normans
programme.desc: The second of the two-part documentary follows the course of the invasion, as Strongbow wins victory after victory. In 1171 Henry II arrived to takes control of Ireland, and he granted land there to settlers from Britain. Now archaeology and cutting-edge science reveal their fascinating lives. The episode also shows how the conquest of Ireland enabled centuries of war between England and France

programme.title: The Great British Dig: History in Your Back Garden
programme.desc: Hugh Dennis and the team solve a medieval mystery in Coventry, as they search for a monastic grange known as Biggin Hall, which provided produce for the nearby monks at St Marys Priory. As the team dig deeper, they not only uncover all kinds of exciting artefacts that tell them more about the lives of the monks, but completely redraw the map of what we thought we knew about the grange itself in Coventry

programme.title: The Abyss: Rise and Fall of the Nazis
programme.desc: The invasion of Poland by the German army in 1939, examining how Hitler succeeded in pushing through his rearmament and war plans relatively unhindered

programme.title: The Last Burma Star
programme.desc: Explorer Levison Wood and historian Alex Bescoby set out on an urgent mission to honour the last surviving veterans of the Burma Campaign - the brutal, often forgotten chapter of the Second World War fought in the jungles of Asia. Levisons own grandfather fought in Burma - now Myanmar - while Alex spent almost a decade living and working in Myanmar. Together they retrace the battlefields that shaped the fate of the war, uncovering the huge but overlooked contribution of Commonwealth soldiers

programme.title: Black Death Patient Zero

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: A team attempts to locate a Second World War British plane that went missing in Iceland. Fossils are found in an Alaskan riverbank. In Antarctica an undiscovered depression in the ice is investigated, while in Russia, 34,000-year-old graves are discovered

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice

programme.title: American Godfathers: The Five Families
programme.desc: For decades five families - Genovese, Gambino, Bonnano, Colombo and Lucchese - ruled New York and built an underworld empire. This documentary traces the early development of the American Mafia in the US city and their evolution through the Prohibition era to the booming 1950s. It examines how public violence, drug trafficking and government hearings impacted the families operations and their supposed code of honour. Narrated by Michael Imperioli

programme.title: Mission Unexplained

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: Nick and Hank investigate a series of mysterious deaths in which people simply exploded, and discover it may be the consequence of a centuries-long feud. Elsewhere, Monroe and Rosalee talk about moving their relationship a stage further. David Giuntoli and Russell Hornsby star

programme.desc: Explorer Levison Wood and historian Alex Bescoby set out on an urgent mission to honour the last surviving veterans of the Burma Campaign - the brutal, often forgotten chapter of the Second World War fought in the jungles of Asia. Levisons own grandfather fought in Burma - now Myanmar - while Alex spent almost a decade living and working in Myanmar. Together they retrace the battlefields that shaped the fate of the war, uncovering the huge but overlooked contribution of Commonwealth soldiers

The 20th anniversary Red Bull Valparaíso Cerro Abajo was held in 2024, and Lucas Borba of Brazil was crowned the champion. The event saw 15,000 spectators watch as Borba completed the extreme urban downhill course

programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the ill-fated 1970 Apollo 13 mission to the moon. programme.title: Railroad Australia
programme.desc: Bernies coal truck odyssey goes horribly wrong. Two veteran locomotives risk destruction in a race for glory, and a mega-train faces the steepest grades in Australia. Documentary shedding light on the work of railway staff responsible for transporting train passengers through the blistering heat of the vast Australian wilderness

programme.title: Special Ops: To Catch a Criminal
programme.desc: This documentary series follows the investigations of unique specialist units within UK police forces created to crack tough cases ranging from cyber heists, romance fraud and people trafficking to drug rings and murder. With unique access to some of Britain’s most talented detectives, the series explores their investigations, their methods, and the evidence that has put some of the UK’s most dangerous criminals behind bars. Each episode features unique evidential police footage as they take on the criminals and hunt for clues to solve the cases and experiences first-hand the work of these elite units on the front line while witnessing their bravery, skill, and compassion amid tragedy and loss. The series also discover how detectives operate in the interview room, how forensics bring a case into focus, and how expert CCTV and digital analysis create timelines and evidence to catch a criminal and the impact these crimes have on the communities they serve

programme.title: Special Ops: To Catch a Criminal
programme.desc: A gunfight in suburban Kent leaves a victim seriously wounded and starts a frenetic high-pressure race to hunt down the perpetrators

programme.title: Top Gear

Richard Hammond pays tribute to the Land Rover by attempting to drive one straight up the side of a dam, and James May puts the Mercedes AMG GT through its paces. Taking to the test track in the Reasonably Priced Car are Will Smith and Margot Robbie

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May encounter artillery shells, corsets and classic hot hatchbacks as they take a nostalgic look at French company Peugeot, while Richard Hammond is at the test track to compare the Porsche Cayman GTS with the latest Chevrolet Corvette. programme.title: Birds of a Feather
programme.desc: The police use Sharons house for a surveillance operation - prompting a debate about who they might be watching. Comedy, starring Pauline Quirke and Linda Robson

programme.title: Birds of a Feather
programme.desc: Sharons growing relationship with boyfriend Colin hits the rocks, threatening her new-found happiness. Comedy, starring Pauline Quirke, Linda Robson and Lesley Joseph

programme.title: Pie in the Sky
programme.desc: Crabbe investigates a psychics claims to have received a sack of poison-pen letters, and concludes her apparent plight is all a cheap publicity stunt - until he uncovers a possible link between the hate mail and a local girls death. Offbeat crime drama, starring Richard Griffiths, Maggie Steed and Selina Cadell

programme.title: Pie in the Sky
programme.desc: Crabbe has cause to regret getting involved in an elderly cookery writers family affairs, and a series of squabbles among the staff only add to his woes. Comedy drama, starring Richard Griffiths and Maggie Steed

programme.title: Pie in the Sky
programme.desc: Fisher ropes Crabbe into helping investigate the death of a policewoman in the West Country, a task that almost puts him off his food. Detective drama, starring Richard Griffiths and Malcolm Sinclair

programme.title: Father Brown

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: The team reopens the 10-year-old murder of a librarian who also belonged to a witches coven, and tries to track down the other members of the group. Halford has visions of his dead wife, and becomes convinced he has been cursed, while Lane starts to suspect the killing may have been part of a human sacrifice. With guest star Stephanie Beacham

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: A police informant resurfaces after 17 years on the run, and claims to have details implicating a crook-turned-celebrity in an unsolved armed robbery. programme.title: Darby and Joan
programme.desc: New details about her late husbands past overwhelm Joan and she desperately needs space from Jack, but finds herself alone and in danger when thieves target her

programme.title: Darby and Joan

programme.title: Whitstable Pearl

programme.title: The Brokenwood Mysteries

programme.title: Sherwood
programme.desc: As the hunt for the killer continues, Kevin Salisbury from the Met arrives to assist in the investigation. Tensions mount as the killer torments the community further. Ian gathers his team at the parish hall, and Kevin sits in on the meeting. As they talk through their findings, PC Patel interrupts to alert them to the arrow attack. Drama inspired by real events, starring David Morrissey, Lesley Manville and Robert Glenister

programme.title: Blackshore
programme.desc: As The Blackwater Whiskey Festival arrives, it appears that the Roisin Hurley case has been solved. However, Fia knows there is more to the story, and with her partner Cian Furlongs help, she takes the law into her own hands to uncover the truth. This truth brings her closer to her own dark past, as she goes head to head with Bill McGuire

programme.title: Rebus
programme.desc: The detective angers his superiors when he tries to connect a member of Edinburghs criminal fraternity to the shooting of two boys and a teacher at a local college. programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team create a safe and inspiring home space for the Newcombes, who have a two-year-old son with a very rare lung condition. Trailing breathing tubes, equipment the size of tumble dryers, and no downstairs bathroom have turned their once safe home into a risky space for the family. Nick and the team have amassed a huge group of volunteers for Arlo and the family, as they set to work creating a safe and inspiring space that Arlo and his family can call home

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles hits the road to catch up with some of the inspirational people and communities the show has helped in its 20-year history. On his travels across the length and breadth of the country, Nick returns to some of the series biggest and most challenging builds, including Canada Street in Manchester, The Yard in Edinburgh, and DIY SOSs most logistically-difficult and longest build - the construction of the Grenfell Community Centre and Dale Youth Boxing club

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Comedian Rhod Gilbert dons his hard hat as guest presenter for this ambitious build in Brandesburton near Hull, East Yorkshire. The team are joined by local volunteers to transform an overgrown 2.5 acres into a purpose-built adventure campsite for the St Michaels Youth Project (St Mikes), which receives funding from Children in Need

programme.title: MasterChef USA
programme.desc: The duos receive two boxes - with sweet and spicy contents - and each pair of cooks must combine the two boxes of ingredients to make a harmonious, MasterChef-worthy dish

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Sam and Myles respond to a man who has collapsed with severe breathlessness. Husband-and-wife crewmates Ann and Kev treat a homeless man who has been assaulted

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: A student climber plunges from a cliff face in Wharfedale and the team fears he has broken his neck. The medics are also called to treat the victim of a stabbing at a meat plant

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: The medics spring into action when a cyclist plunges down a cliff after a freak accident. A homeowners booby trap - designed to deter burglars - sparks a major rescue operation

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Return of the documentary capturing daily life on the busy maternity ward in Southmead Hospital, Bristol. Mel, 35, is expecting fourth-generation twins and when her waters break, the expectant mum has to choose whether husband Chris or her identical twin sister Cheryl will be her birthing partner. Larger-than-life Su, 36, felt she had hit the jackpot when she met younger man Dan, 28, and the couple arrive at Southmead in high spirits. Their baby is in breech so the couple have been booked for a Caesarean - but their plans soon change. Meanwhile, Rob is praying for a son as partner Katy is rushed to the delivery suite

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: When Marion, 30, and Rachel, 32, wanted to start a family they went in search of a sperm donor and ended up with twins, but at their 30-week scan, the couple are told one of the babies is not growing properly and they must return to Southmead Hospital the next day for a C-section. Image-conscious Sarah, 28, and her husband, 40-year-old personal trainer Rob, reach a compromise over baby names in the delivery suite, while 39-year-old Ollie arrives armed with blankets, rugs and all the essentials to make sure his expectant wife, 33-year-old Kate, is as comfortable as possible

programme.title: Hungry for It
programme.desc: In the Level Up challenge, the cooks must transform basic tinned food into a bougie brunch that blows the mentors socks off. The Service Challenge is pasta, but with a twist. Theres only one rule - no traditional Italian dishes are permitted Guest judge Nathaniel Smith - AKA @TheGrubworksKitchen - has had huge viral hits with some of his mash-up ideas, and the cook who most impresses in the restaurant kitchen will win a live cook-along with Nathan in front of all his followers. For the nail-biting Knives Out challenge, the bottom two cooks must make churros with salted caramel sauce

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: Saffys autobiographical play is about to open at a fringe theatre and her father Justin arrives to provide moral support while Eddie, fearing public humiliation, lurks in the wings scheming with Bubble to ruin the show. Starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley, Julia Sawalha, Christopher Ryan, Mo Gaffney, Naoko Mori and Miles Western

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: When three teenagers collapse after taking uncut cocaine, Diane and Sally are sent to visit the school they all attend. There they break up a fight and further investigations reveal the two girls involved are both caught up in the local drugs scene as suppliers. Grace makes a momentous decision about her career and Phil drops a bombshell on his Sun Hill colleagues

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Former Footballers Wives star Ben Richards joins the cast as PC Nate Roberts, a seasoned professional with an appetite for action and an eye for the ladies. Meanwhile, Phil Hunter clears his desk and prepares to move on, convinced none of his Sun Hill colleagues except Sam will give him a second thought. Diane is shocked to encounter an old army pal living in a squat with his girlfriend, who has been injured in a crack den fire

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part one of two. A paranoid schizophrenic is the main suspect in the case of a prowler who attacked a woman and then stabbed Reg, who answered the call for help. Neil recognises the man as someone he arrested four years previously, and takes pity on him when it emerges he did not receive appropriate medical help at the time and has since been victimised by neighbours on his estate

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part two of two. Schizophrenic Michael Simms threatens Shelley Cooper with a knife and when the woman is later killed, Neil orders CO19 to shoot him, assuming Simms is the culprit. In the subsequent inquiry by the Department of Professional Standards, the DIs judgement is called into question by his own superior officer and he faces the prospect that his career could be over

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: When Dianes neighbour is knocked unconscious with an iron, it looks as if his wife is escaping from an abusive marriage, but all is not as it seems. Meanwhile, Smithy and Nate answer a call from a man who has been sold fake raffle tickets, but the teenage mum accused of the crime impresses the coppers enough to earn a second chance to sort out her life

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Noel Fitzpatrick offers cutting-edge treatment for Luca, a long-suffering four-year-old springer spaniel with a painful elbow disease. He designs and creates a special screw for Lucas leg with a system for injecting a bone-growth gel around it, and after an eight-year-old Newfoundland collapses, its owners face an agonising wait for the MRI scans to reveal if anything can be done for the gentle giant

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Emma Bunton visits Southmead Hospital to support the maternity units charity, and her arrival causes quite a stir, with midwife Sacha bringing in some treasured Spice Girls memorabilia to get signed. Meanwhile, expectant mum Tina must decide whether she has a future with her partner, and Sarahs labour progresses quickly, but she cant get in touch with her husband. Catherine and Phillip, who met online, eagerly await the start of their family life together

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Sooze found the birth of her first baby easy and confidently arrives at Southmead with her husband Joe, but the contractions quickly get the better of her. Teri and Merv, who are about to have their fourth child, talk about the cravings Teri has experienced this time round, while Becki and Ian nervously await their new arrival, having finally committed to each other following an on-off romance

programme.title: Ambulance Australia
programme.desc: Officers deal with a high volume of pregnancy-related calls in the summer, while emergency workers respond to a car crash on a remote dirt road

programme.title: Ambulance Australia
programme.desc: Paramedics Ali and Josh respond to an urgent stabbing and get stuck in the middle of a terrifying street brawl. Plus, a terrible hailstorm tears through the city

programme.title: Hungry for It
programme.desc: Its fast food week, and with a place in the semi-final at stake, the final five cooks level up instant noodles and attempt to bash out Mexican fast food in just 90 seconds. Guest judge Sarah Newman reveals that the prize is for the winning cook to get their salsa recipe on the menu nationwide in over 50 Tortilla restaurants. The bottom two must battle it out in the most challenging Knives Out elimination and after a dramatic contest against the clock, one cook is sent home narrowly misses out on a place in the semi-final

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: As Edinas PR company collapses round her ears thanks to Bubble, Saffy forces her to attend a Menopause Anonymous meeting, where she can share the experiences of other women and learn to love her hormone patches. The change appears to be having an alarming effect on Patsy, however, who is turning into something of a domestic goddess. With guest stars Twiggy, Ruby Wax and Dale Winton

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey to Quebec City, beginning by boarding the train from Nova Scotia to New Brunswick. Along the way he investigates the worlds biggest tide at Hopewell Rocks and admires its dramatic rock formations and caves. He also appears to defy gravity on a magnetic hill in a 1965 Pontiac Bonneville, before joining the Elsipogtog First Nation to learn about quilting and traditional dress. He also goes fishing for oysters and helps quarry 150-year-old sandstone

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo explores the Province of Quebec, taking the Charlevoix train along the north bank of the St Lawrence River to La Malbaie. Along the way he flies over the Laurentian Mountains in a seaplane, fishes for trout and views the waterfall at Montmorency from a zipwire - and thats just the first half of this leg

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo strikes west across Manitoba into the province of Saskatchewan. High above the Prairie at Riding Mountain, he discovers how a middle-class British boy from Hastings transformed himself into an influential indigenous naturalist called Grey Owl. Deep in the Prairie, he finds a network of railways that once served the wheat farmers of Saskatchewan, and learns how communities grew up around the grain elevators used to load the crops on to rail wagons

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: The final leg of Michael Portillos journey begins in Edmonton, where he learns about the people who 300 years ago travelled huge distances by foot and canoe to trade with indigenous people. He also admires the citys early 20th-century streetcars, preserved by the Radial Railway Society, and its light rail system. Moving on, he views the Rocky Mountains, marvels at the scale of Canadas forestry industry and discovers how the beaver, once slaughtered for its fur, is now pampered

programme.title: Animal Emergency

programme.title: Animal Kingdom
programme.desc: Vet Steve Leonard examines some of the Erindi Game Reserves smaller animals, and encounters a potentially deadly scorpion. Meanwhile, a male lion causes a serious problem for the team when it tries to escape into cattle country outside the park

programme.title: Animal Kingdom

programme.desc: People whose partners forced, tricked and coerced them into committing crimes. programme.title: Death Row: Countdown to Execution
programme.desc: Susanna Reid travels to Texas to meet convicted killer Billie Wayne Coble in the days leading up to his scheduled execution. In 1989 he pleaded guilty to triple murder and has been on death row ever since. Now 70, he is fighting for a last-minute stay of execution. If it fails, he will be the oldest man put to death in Texas for more than 100 years. Susannah asks Billie to relive the night of the crime and tries to find out how it has affected him and also speaks to his relatives and others involved in the case

programme.title: Evil in the Room: The Ashling Murphy Story

Meanwhile, Vernon moves into his new mansion, but has trouble keeping up with his well-to-do neighbours. Rural drama, starring James Carlton, Duncan Bell and Geoffrey Hughes

As the team delves deeper into the circumstances surrounding Suzys death, details of her torrid emotional state reveal a surprising new line of enquiry. Battling her brothers partner and meeting her sons new and over-enthusiastic girlfriend Kelly, Cathy prepares herself for a day of great emotion, with a little help from her friend Michael. Yet amid the grief, she is determined to find out who she is again, and possibly find love a second time around. Family comedy, starring Lesley Manville and Peter Mullan

programme.title: Mum
programme.desc: The first Valentines Day since the death of Cathys husband arrives, so her brother Derek comes round to show moral support and keep her company. However, his partner Pauline wishes that she was anywhere other than in attendance. Son Jason breaks some surprising news, and when Michael turns up unannounced, hes concerned to find that Cathy has received a Valentines card. Subtle family comedy following the fortunes of a bereaved woman, starring Lesley Manville, Ross Boatman and Peter Mullan

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike attracts the unwanted attentions of a famous romantic novelist who has moved to the area in search of literary inspiration, while borstal boys on a work placement cause mayhem in the village. Greengrass helps a would-be councillors election campaign - and has no qualms about playing dirty to foil rival candidate Blaketons bid for office. Starring Jason Durr and Bill Maynard

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike plans to marry Jackie in secret, but the search for an armed train robber threatens to keep him from getting to the church on time. Meanwhile, Greengrass faces another kind of crisis _ his charismatic sister Isabelle turns up in Aidensfield, and proves to be more than a match for him. Judy Cornwell guest stars

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Blaketons attempts to crack down on crime meet with a violent response and Ginas interest is aroused by a mysterious visitor. Greengrass has his eye on the main chance as usual - he reckons there is big money to be made by attracting tourists to Aidensfield and decides to rewrite local history to make the village more interesting. Derek Fowlds, Tricia Penrose and Bill Maynard star

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Hathaway appears to have got over his fear of Lewis treading over his newly promoted toes. Their opposites have attracted in the past, and there seems no reason to suspect that they wont now the younger man has got used to the idea of his former mentor coming out of retirement to lend him a hand. Even DS Maddox isnt getting on Hathaways nerves quite as much, so this rejuvenated trio sets out to discover who murdered American classics student Rose Anderson, whose body has been hauled from the canal with neck and abdomen wounds. Nevertheless, a few red herrings threaten to get in their way of landing the killer. Kevin Whately, Laurence Fox and Angela Griffin star

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: A special standalone episode that delves into Bears life since leaving the village, revealing his descent into hard times and his swift entanglement in an uncontrollable situation

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Charity is alarmed that Ross is inveigling himself further into her familys life by befriending Mack. Paddy prepares to make a statement to the police about Bears disappearance

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Robert opens up about his past life in prison, while Aaron is emotional and Vic is shocked

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Kev is sent spiralling, Paddy is troubled and Eve thinks she has spotted her grandfather

programme.title: Emmerdale - 50 Unforgettable Years
programme.desc: This one-off special features cast members past and present as they reflect on 50 years of the Yorkshire soap, which began as a lunchtime soap on British TV

programme.title: Agatha Christies Marple
programme.desc: The sleuth helps an old friend find refuge at country house Greenshaws Folly, but a sinister shadow falls over the strange buildings various inhabitants and a murderer strikes. Miss Marple uncovers secrets from the past about Miss Greenshaw as a dangerous storm gathers and the bodies start to pile up. Julia McKenzie heads an all-star cast that includes Jim Moir (better known as Vic Reeves), Kimberley Nixon, Fiona Shaw, Robert Glenister, Julia Sawalha, Judy Parfitt and Matt Willis (formerly of pop group Busted)

programme.title: Paul OGradys Animal Orphans
programme.desc: The animal lover returns to Lilayi Elephant Nursery in Zambia, where he is reunited with Nkala, a calf he met last year. In Namibia, at Naankuse Wildlife Sanctuary, he meets five-month-old cheetah Joris, who is about to have some company in his enclosure, and Paul is also given the task of releasing two leopard tortoises back into the wild

programme.title: Million Pound Pawn
programme.desc: In Sheffield, Dan visits retired couple Gloria and Mick, who are looking for a buyer for an 18th-century railway carriage that they have painstakingly restored. With a price tag of over two million pounds, Dan has to hope that his little black book of contacts can help him get the deal across the line

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.sub-title: How Long Has This Been Going On?
programme.desc: Morwenna is back as receptionist and the Ellinghams have a new dog. Martin attends Stewarts survival course, but not as a participant like Al and Penhale. Louisa agrees to help Pippa by speaking at the school assembly alongside Mrs Tishell. Drama, starring Martin Clunes as a surgeon who is forced to retrain as a GP and takes up a post in a sleepy Cornish village where he soon finds himself at odds with the locals

programme.title: Home Fires
programme.desc: As the war in Europe draws closer to home and the nation faces its darkest hour, the members of the WI find they have their own battles to fight. Alison looks for a way out of her desperate situation, and Frances tries to help Pat while she still can. Miriam keeps an important piece of news from Bryn, and Richard and Laura realise it may not be possible to keep their affair a secret any longer. Conclusion of the Second World War drama, starring Fenella Woolgar and Francesca Annis

programme.title: Shetland
programme.desc: Detective drama set on the Scottish archipelago. When Shetlander Thomas Malone has his murder conviction overturned after 23 years, which hes spent behind bars, Perez has to reopen an investigation into the 1994 death of local teenager Lizzie Kilmuir. Later, Perez gets a text from Cassie saying she is unexpectedly flying back to Shetland, so he and Duncan meet her at the airport. Starring Douglas Henshall, Stephen Walters and Alison ODonnell

programme.title: Live UEFA European Qualifiers
programme.desc: Greece v Scotland (Kick-off 7.45pm). All the action from the FIFA World Cup Group C qualifier, held at Karaiskakis Stadium in Piraeus.
